title: Stories of Other Worlds and A Honeymoon in Space: From the Forgotten Futures Library
description: In 1901, THE SOLAR SYSTEM WAS A VERY DIFFERENT PLACE. George Griffith's Stories of Other worlds" and A Honeymoon in Space Lord Redgrave and his new bride, Zaldie explore the heavily populated Solar System of 1901. Space creatures here they come.
author: George Chetwynd Griffith
